sys_variable_value.value:
New ATAT portfolio started provisioning

Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Title started provisioning the Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Name portfolio within Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Name.  Please review the following information:

 

Task Order #: Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Task Order Number

Total Obligated Amount: Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Funds Obligated
Total Task Order Amount:  Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Funds Total

Classification/Impact Levels: Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Classification Level

For more information regarding this portfolio, please contact Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Formal Name at Trigger - Record Updated➛...➛Email.
